level.heading: Conflicting laws and regulations repealed.
level.text: All laws or parts of laws and regulations promulgated thereunder in conflict with the provisions of this part shall be, and the same are hereby, repealed.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Boards, commissions and committees, application of law, see § 1-321.02.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted this subchapter into law.
